label: Cpu2wiotp for $ARCH2
description: Sample Horizon workload that repeatedly reads the CPU load and sends it to WIoTP

userInput.name: WIOTP_CLASS_ID
userInput.label: 'd' if it is a device or 'g' if it is a gateway. A value of '-' means get it from HZN_DEVICE_ID.

userInput.name: WIOTP_DEVICE_TYPE
userInput.label: The device or gateway type that you created in the WIoTP UI. A value of '-' means get it from HZN_DEVICE_ID.

userInput.name: WIOTP_DEVICE_ID
userInput.label: The device or gateway id that you created in the WIoTP UI. A value of '-' means get it from HZN_DEVICE_ID.

userInput.name: WIOTP_DEVICE_AUTH_TOKEN
userInput.label: The token you gave to the device or gateway you created in the WIoTP UI
